Atades - Asociacin Tutelar Aragonesa de Discapacidad Intelectual es una entidad sin nimo de lucro que atiende a personas con discapacidad intelectual y a sus familias en Aragn, fundada en 1962.

Principales programas y servicios:
- Atemtia:  estimulacin precoz, atencin postemprana y respiro familiar.
- Educacin especial: colegios San Martn de Porres y San Antonio 
- Centros residenciales, ocupacionales y de da: Sonsoles (Alagn), Santo ngel, Centro de Da El Vergel e Integra Aragn, en Zaragoza.
- Centros especiales de empleo: Oliver, actividad industrial para el sector del electrodomstico; Gardeniers, jardinera y agricultura ecolgica; y, Logstica Social, servicios asistenciales a PCDI y el proyecto de eco-paquetera de ltima milla Koiki. 
- Agencia de Colocacin y Centro de Formacin, acreditados por el INAEM.
- Itinerarios de insercin socio laboral en el mbito rural: IRIS.
- Cielos de Ascara: iniciativa de innovacin social dirigida a la insercin socio laboral en las comarcas de la Jacetania y Alto Gllego.
- Programa de vida autnoma e inclusin (VAI): formacin-evaluacin de capacidad para AVD y viviendas con apoyo.
- Unidad de Atencin a Victimas con Discapacidad UAVDI-Aragn, proyecto en red en con la Fundacin ALAPAR.
- Programa de intervencin con personas con inteligencia lmite - UPCIL.
- Programa de envejecimiento activo.
- Proyectos de empoderamiento de personas con discapacidad intelectual.
- Club de Ocio y Tiempo Libre Los Tigres.
- Escuelas de deporte adaptado, en colaboracin con la Fundacin Real Madrid (Futbol), Fundacin Basket Zaragoza (Baloncesto) y Padel Zaragoza (Padel); y club deportivo.
- Programas de voluntariado, voluntariado inclusivo y voluntariado corporativo.

Atades desarrolla su labor tutelar a travs de la Fundacin Aragonesa Tutelar - FUNDAT.


Ofrece servicios de asesora jurdica, asesora psicolgica, respiro familiar y plan de formacin, todos ellos dirigidos a familias de personas con discapacidad intelectual.

Stage of investment:
Women angels for STEAM (WA4STEAM) is a growing international community of women angel investors seeking to increase the presence of women entrepreneurs in the STEAM fields. 

Visit our website to learn how you can join us as a business angel or submit your STEAM project. https://wa4steam.com/ 

The wide variety of backgrounds of our members, with professional expertise in biosciences, mathematics, finance, law, communication and team coaching and training and its rich network of strategic partners ,add significant value to the early stages of startups life cycle. 

We aim to provide not only seed capital but to become a strategic partner nurturing women future leaders and role models for girls and women of all ages. 

Why STEAM

It is now widely accepted among economists that innovation, research and development are the basis for a sustainable growth in the future, and careers that are focused on STEAM are usually associated to high quality rewarding jobs.

Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts & Architecture and Mathematics are the future pillars of the economy but also among the fields with the largest gender gap. 

WA4STEAM, being an all-women business angels group has the responsibility to help and can provide the needed support to close that gap.

E mais orgulho ainda de botar isso em prtica. Todos os dias.

New Balance Ibera (Alfico S.A.U.) is one of the Spanish companies with the biggest tradition in the sportswear distribution field . Born in 1975 as pioneering the expansion of the New Balance brand in Europe and becoming part of the New Balance Athletics Inc. family in 2016 and distributing the New Balance Brand in Spain, Portugal and Andorra.

At New Balance we stand for something bigger than sneakers. We champion those who are fearlessly driven by their passions. We elevate sport. We do right by people and the planet. Together, we drive meaningful change in communities around the world.

Our goal is to help you achieve yours, our job is to aid athletes in their pursuits, whether that means helping professional athletes set records and win medals, or propelling everyday athletes to achieve a new PR, run their first 5K or just to live a more healthy and active lifestyle.

Our products are the perfect blend of function and fashion, giving you the performance technology you need and the style you want. Our associates around the world bring these goals to life with their high-level skills and creativity. While we offer the best product on the market, were also equally committed to giving back. So while we look to succeed, we believe in ensuring others have the same opportunity.

We're Wales only FTSE 100 company with forward-thinking approaches and endless opportunities to test, learn and grow. There's a reason we've been named one of the best places to work in the UK: our progressive culture, core values, and commitment to diversity and inclusion has created a working environment where people share ideas, arent afraid to speak up and change things, and above all, are felt valued.

Based on innovation and organic growth Admiral has grown from being a small start-up into one of the largest car insurance providers in the UK. The company is constantly investigating new products, services and markets, we're now in 8 countries with a diverse product portfolio.

Admirals success goes hand-in-hand with having a strong people-focused culture. We believe that happy people make happy customers and happy customers help increase profits. Our philosophy is a simple yet effective one: people who enjoy what they do, do it better! 

We truly care about our customers, they are at the heart of every decision we make. Were very proud of the innovative products we offer and the level of service we provide. Everything we do acknowledges the needs of our customers and by recruiting the right people, we can continue to provide great service and ensure an excellent experience for our customers.

Admiral people work hard to keep us at the top of our industry and are rewarded for itwith competitive pay, great benefits, a share package based on company performance, flexibility and work-life balance opportunities, nearby fitness and health centres, and other special perks.

Stage of investment:
Wonderbly is the worlds leading personalised publishing company. We make wonderful, unique books for wonderful customers all over the world.

Our mission is to make people feel extraordinarily special, and bring them closer to the people they love, through the power of personalised stories. So far weve shipped over 10 million books to over 150 countries. Weve done this in just eight years, and were just getting started.

Getting personalised books to all those millions of customers requires a multidisciplinary team. Our people have experience across editorial design, research, production, software engineering, marketing, ecommerce, data analysis, print-on-demand manufacturing, shipping the list goes on. 

This means that Wonderbly is a very collaborative and creative place to work, with opportunities for growth and development across a broad range of skills.

Were based mainly in London, where we have a bright and light studio for working together. But like many digital first companies, we have a hybrid operating model with many colleagues working much of the time remotely. 

Our values
Wonderblys values were born from the three enduring qualities at the heart of Lost My Name - our original and best-selling childrens  book. These values are Courage, Curiosity and Kindness. And although they naturally have a child-friendly ring to them, these are deeply human values that we believe everyone should live by.


COURAGE - means taking calculated risks and trying things that no one else would. It's setting audacious goals, seeing them through, and being willing to be wrong. 

CURIOSITY - means investing in learning, never losing sight of WHY. Curiosity allows us to ask silly questions, explore our blind spots, and dip into other disciplines for inspiration. 

KINDNESS - is the Wonderbly heart: its no coincidence that deep friendships form here. Kindness means making space for one another, inclusivity as standard, and clear, direct communication.

2020 update : TravelCar Changes Its Name and Becomes Free2Move, Initiating a New Phase to Accelerate Its Development

--------
TravelCar is a global mobility platform for the travel and automotive industries with  two innovative products:
 
>>>> T-Park: Global parking booking solution
Available in 50 countries on 5 continents with 30 different languages and 25 currencies, travelers easily find the right spot at a great rate whether parking at an airport, train station, cruise port, or city center. Through a seamless booking experience, customers compare rates, reviews, locations and amenities in full transparency. They drop-off and pick-up their cars using our automated gating and proprietary self-service kiosk technology, enabling our partners lots to be operated independently at unmanned locations (e.g., hotels).  
 
We serve the needs of:
1/ Airlines, OTAs and SBTs by adding parking as a new ancillary revenue 
2/ Auto OEMs by featuring our global parking platform in their connected vehicles
3/ Parking operators, airports and hotels by listing their parking on our system to reach new customers and increase revenue
 
>>>> T-Rent: Unique car sharing platform
Thousands of car owners leave their cars idle in long-term lots every day.  With T-Rent, instead of paying to park, travelers benefit from a guaranteed free parking spot and earn money when they share their car with other trusted users.

Beyond a simple online sharing marketplace, we deliver a turnkey customer experience, manage the vehicles from A to Z during their absence and provide auto insurance that protects owners and renters. Renters, with this smarter car rental solution, save 50% compared to traditional car rental agencies.

-------------------------------------  
And we're growing fast! Founded in 2012, TravelCar has offices in beautiful France and sunny California. Weve raised more than $22M in funds and we are aggressively continuing to expand our global footprint.

Stage of investment:
Bienvenue dans un monde en qute de confiance !

Au quotidien, les professionnels utilisent de plus en plus leur smartphone pour prendre des photos : tats des lieux, visites de risque, suivi de chantier, constat de sinistre

Pourquoi ? Parce qu'il est devenu trop facile de les falsifier avec une IA ou un logiciel de retouche graphique.

Bonne ide ! Sauf quil y a un problme : elles ne seront daucune utilit pour traiter un litige.
Pourquoi ? Il est impossible aujourd'hui de prouver lauthenticit dune simple photo (sa date, son origine et le contexte gographique).

Les acteurs du BTP, de l'assurance, du transport et de l'immobilier ont besoin de preuves numriques fiables pour travailler en toute srnit.

Certificall, cest lapplication mobile qui aide les entreprise  transformer leurs photos en preuves recevables pour : 
 Contrler et constater des situations pour votre entreprise, de manire fiable, sans vous dplacer,
 Certifier vos constats de chantier, vos rapports dintervention sur site, et vos visites de risques - 
 Fiabiliser les dclarations de sinistre de vos clients et acclrez leur traitement.

Lapplication CERTIFICALL rend la preuve numrique accessible  tous les professionnels.

Une certification des photos garantie au travers de 4 piliers :
 Prise de photo contrle
 Signature certifie et horodatage
 Certificat de photographie infalsifiable
 Stockage scuris 10 ans

Les entreprises ont besoin dun nouveau standard de confiance et d'efficacit : la preuve numrique.

Contactez-nous sur contact@certificall.app pour toute demande !

Stage of investment:
VERIFYING THE AUTHENTICITY OF PEOPLE AND GOODS IS A PERENNIAL CHALLENGE FOR HUMANITY.

Today, globalization and digitization are driving a rapidly growing market for identification and authentication as a result of increasing security challenges. Counterfeiting, fraud and piracy are already widespread across countries and sectors and represent a $1,000 billion global industry. As a result, the general loss of trust in what is real and what is not is creating a strong global desire for integrity. As a result, industries must use the best tools available to create a universally trusted environment and protect themselves from a significant drain on commercial and intellectual resources. 
IntegrySign provides the solution with HyperMark & HUMETRX. 

How many personal items do you have that YOU can judge and value as authentic? If you are true to yourself - very few. For everything else, we have to trust a certificate, a person, an institution, etc. With IntegrySign's HyperMark solution, YOU can check the authenticity of goods and people yourself - completely tamper-proof, with no one and nothing in between, easy to use and cost effective. HyperMark combines several cutting-edge technologies in a novel way to create true volume holograms with deterministic information. This makes each hologram's content complex, infinitely scalable and unique, yet still readable by the human eye and therefore easily verifiable by YOU. 

IntegrySign's HUMETRX (HUman MEtric MaTRiX) voice biometric authentication technology is the future of biometric security. 
The HUMETRX concept is to access your personal information and authenticate yourself in a unique, simple and secure way, anytime, anywhere. 
HUMETRX biometric authentication provides unique and superior protection by integrating the full spectrum of a user's unprocessed raw voice streams. With a simple pass phrase, you can uniquely, quickly, easily and securely identify yourself and access your personal data anytime, anywhere.

NearBuzz is an advertising platform for offline media agencies and outdoor digital screen networks, powered by Computer Vision technology for Audience Analytics and IoT for real-time place context.

We enable brands and agencies to run interactive campaigns on outdoor digital displays, with programmable context based triggers for real-time targeted Ads. We provide audience insights and metrics to analyse the effectiveness of the campaign.

Traditionally, offline (outdoor) advertising is - one way, expensive and not easy to execute. As an advertiser, one would wish to have a clear visibility of the campaign and its performance while reaching to the right target audience and geography.

Our solution helps brands and agencies to -
1. Target: Define target audience and deliver targeted content in real-time using IoT based context engine.
2. Engage: Build interactive campaigns to engage and collect data using our interaction technology.
3. Analyse: Get audience insights (age, gender, emotions, attention span etc.) with our audience analytics engine.

Our vision is to make advertising in offline as convenient as doing it online. We aim to be the leading technology company in solving the challenges in offline advertising using our technology products and solutions. We do this by,
 Computer Vision based Audience Analytics
 Interactivity and Real-time Triggers based on Advanced Context Engine
 Proprietary Ad-Serve engine based on Evolving Context

Brasileira e empreendedora, a Stone nasceu e cresceu com base em uma crena: o cliente no tem sempre razo. O cliente  a razo. Foi por ele que o trabalho comeou, em 2012. E  por ele que o trabalho nunca tem fim.

Em 2018, abrimos capital na bolsa de Nova Iorque. E sabe quem estava l conosco? Nosso primeiro cliente, o Mineiro.  simples: aqui dentro, sucesso s pode ser consequncia de servir bem aos donos e donas de negcio. 

Hoje, somos 15 mil apaixonados espalhados pelas cinco regies do pas, trabalhando pra milhares de empreendedores de variados segmentos. Por isso, temos orgulho de dizer que somos a parceira do empreendedor brasileiro. 

E mais orgulho ainda de botar isso em prtica. Todos os dias. 

Quer saber mais sobre nossas vagas e nossa cultura? Acesse: https://jornada.stone.com.br/

Stage of investment:
The angel venture fund Angel One was created by the UCU Foundation. The goal of the Fund is to invest in Ukrainian startups, help them realize their ideas, and develop a startup culture in Ukraine.

The Fund will provide pre-seed & seed capital to scale startups based on technologies, innovations, and intellectual property developed by Ukrainian founders. We invest in Ukrainian startups in all categories of technology, in amounts ranging from $50,000 to $200,000. The main focus will be on FinTech, SaaS, EduTech, AI/ML. However, a third of the investments will be made in Edtech startups and those seeking to make a significant impact in solving global problems.

We start with $1,5M in-house capital and will continue the fundraising campaign in Ukraine and globally.

Industry: Italian Copy Editor & Customer Service Angel
Stage of investment:
Wonderbly is the worlds leading personalised publishing company. We make wonderful, unique books for wonderful customers all over the world.

Our mission is to make people feel extraordinarily special, and bring them closer to the people they love, through the power of personalised stories. So far weve shipped over 10 million books to over 150 countries. Weve done this in just eight years, and were just getting started.

Getting personalised books to all those millions of customers requires a multidisciplinary team. Our people have experience across editorial design, research, production, software engineering, marketing, ecommerce, data analysis, print-on-demand manufacturing, shipping the list goes on. 

This means that Wonderbly is a very collaborative and creative place to work, with opportunities for growth and development across a broad range of skills.

Were based mainly in London, where we have a bright and light studio for working together. But like many digital first companies, we have a hybrid operating model with many colleagues working much of the time remotely. 

Our values
Wonderblys values were born from the three enduring qualities at the heart of Lost My Name - our original and best-selling childrens  book. These values are Courage, Curiosity and Kindness. And although they naturally have a child-friendly ring to them, these are deeply human values that we believe everyone should live by.


COURAGE - means taking calculated risks and trying things that no one else would. It's setting audacious goals, seeing them through, and being willing to be wrong. 

CURIOSITY - means investing in learning, never losing sight of WHY. Curiosity allows us to ask silly questions, explore our blind spots, and dip into other disciplines for inspiration. 

KINDNESS - is the Wonderbly heart: its no coincidence that deep friendships form here. Kindness means making space for one another, inclusivity as standard, and clear, direct communication.

Ich bin spezialisiert auf die Reduktion der Steuerlast fr Selbstndige und Unternehmer - sprich Asset Protection.

Ich bin Partner im Experten-Team von Peter Hrtling fr Florian Homm, Thorsten Wittmann und Jrgen Hller.

Unsere Lsungen wandeln Steuern in eigenes Vermgen um - und das auch noch rckwirkend fr die letzten 3 Jahre. So erreichen wir hufig Steuerstze von 0 - 10 %, wie in einem Steuerparadies, aber ganz legal zuhause.

MEINE EXPERTISE

- Steuern in Vermgen umwandeln (z.B. 22.848 Euro p.a. weniger Steuern zahlen)
- Reduktion bzw. Vermeidung von Schenkungs- und Erbschaftssteuer
- Steuerfreie Wertzuwchse in ETF, Aktien, Investmentfonds, Krypto, Edelmetalle etc.
- EURO, SFr, US$, GBP
- Lsungen in Deutschland, Liechtenstein und der Schweiz
- Grndung einer vermgensverwaltenden GmbH, Stiftung o..
- Grndung einer Firma in Liechtenstein oder der Schweiz
- Weitere Speziallsungen

MEINE KUNDEN

Meine Zielgruppe sind Selbstndige und Unternehmer ab einem Vermgen von 1 Mio. Euro und/oder einer Steuerlast von mehr als 250.000 Euro.

Stage of investment:
BIJ ONS voor elkaar' is een organisatie met professionals die zich inzetten voor de transformatie in het sociale domein. Naast de inzet van de Specialist Ondersteuner Jeugd (SOJ) bij de huisarts, GGD en/of toegangsteams van gemeenten, zetten wij onafhankelijke gedragswetenschappers in ter versterking van bijv. gezinscoachteams. Daarnaast bouwen we samen met welzijnsorganisaties aan de sociale basis door specialistische expertise aan de voorkant, preventief, in te zetten vanuit de diensten SWITCH. 
Met verloskundigen en GGD doen we dit vanuit de dienst Voor Elkaar! En samen met onderwijs vanuit onze dienst begrijpend leven. 

In onze missie tot innovatie van de jeugdhulp staan wij niet alleen. We doen het samen met een breed netwerk aan mensen die anders durven te denken en doen om alle kinderen en jongeren een kansrijke start te bieden. BIJ ONS vormt een beweging waarvoor we alle vernieuwers uitnodigen om samen te werken of juist een van onze projecten te implementeren. Graag stappen we samen in complexe vraagstukken en bouwen we samen aan impactvolle en schaalbare oplossingen rondom (domeinoverstijgende) vraagstukken.
 
We bomen graag met jullie over de toekomst.
